mapper.select: select sum(p.FACTUAL_RAISE_AMOUNT) from ZY_PROJECT_BASIC_INFO p where p.ISTATUS in (30, 50, 60, 70)

select
from ZY_PROJECT_BASIC_INFO p where p.ISTATUS between 30 and 70 and p.IIS_PRERELEASE != 0 and P.IDEL_FLAG = 0 order by P.ISTATUS asc,P.IDISPLAY_FIELD, NVL(TPUBLISH_DATETIME,TINVESTMENT_START_TIME),ID desc
mapper.delete:
delete FROM ZY_PROJECT_BASIC_INFO where guid in
#{idItem}
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
